description:
The top pilot backed by http://anidb.net/ch132070 [Peil Technologies], one of the http://anidb.net/ch132088 [group]`s three branches. A third-year student in the piloting department. Elan is a taciturn and solitary person, who doesn`t open his heart to anyone in school. He has an interest to http://anidb.net/ch124444 [Suletta].
